about.title: About My Resources
about.description: My Resources is an open-source tool for tracking and organizing your online purchases across multiple platforms.
about.feature1: Aggregate purchases from multiple providers (Allegro, eBay, Amazon, OLX, Vinted)
about.feature2: Organize with custom tag groups and values
about.feature3: Group related purchases into compound items
about.feature4: Export and import your data freely
about.feature5: All data stored locally in your browser — no server required
about.openSourceDescription: This project is open source and available on GitHub.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how My Resources handles your data.
privacy.localDataDescription: All your purchase data, tags, settings, and credentials are stored locally in your browser using IndexedDB and localStorage. No data is sent to any server owned by us.
privacy.providersDescription: When you sync with providers like Allegro or eBay, your data is exchanged directly between your browser and the provider's API. We do not intermediate or store this data.
privacy.analyticsDescription: We may use anonymous analytics to understand how the application is used. No personal data or purchase information is included in analytics.
privacy.cookiesDescription: My Resources uses browser localStorage to save your language preference and invitation settings. IndexedDB is used for purchase data. No tracking cookies are used.
privacy.contactDescription: For questions about this privacy policy, please open an issue on our GitHub repository.
